docs.snippet: A suburban Cincinnati man accused of plotting to attack the U.S. Capitol in support of Islamic State extremists is due back in federal court....
docs.lead_paragraph: A suburban Cincinnati man accused of plotting to attack the U.S. Capitol in support of Islamic State extremists is due back in federal court.

headline.main: Ohio Man Pleads Not Guilty to New Charge in US Capitol Case

docs.snippet: Like many people, John Travolta remembers where he was when O.J. Simpson was riding in a white Ford Bronco in that infamous slow-speed pursuit in 1994 before he surrendered to police and later faced murder charges in the deaths of his ex-wife Nico...
docs.lead_paragraph: Like many people, John Travolta remembers where he was when O.J. Simpson was riding in a white Ford Bronco in that infamous slow-speed pursuit in 1994 before he surrendered to police and later faced murder charges in the deaths of his ex-wife Nicole Brown and her friend Ronald Goldman.

headline.main: John Travolta Helps Recreate the O.J. Simpson Trial for FX
headline.print_headline: John Travolta Helps Recreate the O.J. Simpson Trial for FX

docs.snippet: South Africa temporarily halted the deportation of 200 foreigners on Tuesday after a legal challenge by a human rights group, which said authorities were unfairly targeting them  following anti-migrant riots in which seven people were killed....
docs.lead_paragraph: South Africa temporarily halted the deportation of 200 foreigners on Tuesday after a legal challenge by a human rights group, which said authorities were unfairly targeting them  following anti-migrant riots in which seven people were killed.

headline.main: South Africa Delays Deportation of 200 Foreigners After Protests
headline.print_headline: South Africa Delays Deportation of 200 Foreigners After Protests

docs.snippet: Indian parliamentarians must reject proposed changes to a law that would allow children accused of crimes such as rape to be tried and punished as adults, activists said, adding that the amendments violated child rights and would not stem sex crim...
docs.lead_paragraph: Indian parliamentarians must reject proposed changes to a law that would allow children accused of crimes such as rape to be tried and punished as adults, activists said, adding that the amendments violated child rights and would not stem sex crimes.

headline.main: Punishing Child Rapists as Adults Will Not Make India Safer-Experts
headline.print_headline: Punishing Child Rapists as Adults Will Not Make India Safer-Experts

docs.snippet: Lobbing questions on topics ranging from loading ammo clips to booby-trapping apartments and the chemistry of gunshot residue, jurors have waded into the thick of the Colorado movie massacre trial as they weigh the fate of gunman James Holmes....
docs.lead_paragraph: Lobbing questions on topics ranging from loading ammo clips to booby-trapping apartments and the chemistry of gunshot residue, jurors have waded into the thick of the Colorado movie massacre trial as they weigh the fate of gunman James Holmes.

headline.main: Colorado Rule Lets Massacre Trial Jurors Dig Into Thorny Issues
headline.print_headline: Colorado Rule Lets Massacre Trial Jurors Dig Into Thorny Issues
